title: A message from Joseph Fink
description:
Joseph Fink, co-writer of Welcome to Night Vale, here with a special message about his new novel, Alice Isn’t Dead, a retelling and reimagining of the story from the podcast of the same name.

The Alice Isn’t Dead novel is on sale now online and at your local independent book store: http://aliceisntdead.com/#novel

See Joseph Fink across the country on the Alice Isn’t Dead book tour, coming to a city near you starting tonight in Brooklyn: http://aliceisntdead.com/#book-tour
itunes:subtitle: A special message about Joseph Fink's new novel, Alice Isn't Dead.
itunes:author: Night Vale Presents
